title: Google\Cloud\Vision\V1\CropHint
name: CropHint
description:
Single crop hint that is used to generate a new crop when serving an image.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.vision.v1.CropHint

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getBoundingPoly
methods.description:
The bounding polygon for the crop region. The coordinates of the bounding box are in the original image's scale, as returned in ImageParams.

Generated from protobuf field .google.cloud.vision.v1.BoundingPoly bounding_poly = 1;

methods.description:
The bounding polygon for the crop region. The coordinates of the bounding box are in the original image's scale, as returned in ImageParams.

params.name: var
params.description: The bounding polygon for the crop region. The coordinates of the bounding box are in the original image's scale, as returned in ImageParams.

methods.name: getConfidence
methods.description:
Confidence of this being a salient region. Range [0, 1].

Generated from protobuf field float confidence = 2;
